name: @web4/web4tscomponent
description: Web4 TypeScript Component standards enforcement - Web4 compliant version

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && find src/ts -name '*.js' -delete && find src/ts -name '*.js.map' -delete && find src/ts -name '*.d.ts' -delete && find src/ts -name '*.d.ts.map' -delete && rm -f *.tsbuildinfo

author: Web4 Architecture Team
